sentences.sContent: She excels all of us at tennis.

sentences.sCn: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.sContent: They often tennis in the afternoon.
We rank him among the best tennis players.

sentences.sCn: 我们把他列入最优秀网球运动员之列。
